00078   DoubleTab& It_Sou_CoviMAC_Elem(_TYPE_)::ajouter(DoubleTab& resu) const        \
00079   {                                                                        \
00080     ((_TYPE_&) (evaluateur_source_elem)).mettre_a_jour( );                \
00081     assert(resu.nb_dim() < 3);                                                \
00082     int ncomp=1;                                                        \
00083     if (resu.nb_dim() == 2)                                                \
00084       ncomp=resu.dimension(1);                                                \
00085     DoubleVect& bilan = so_base->bilan();                                \
00086     bilan=0;                                                                \
00087     if( ncomp == 1)                                                        \
00088       ajouter_(resu) ;                                                        \
00089     else                                                                \
00090       ajouter_(resu, ncomp) ;                                                \
00091     return resu;                                                        \
00092   }                                                                        \
00093   DoubleTab& It_Sou_CoviMAC_Elem(_TYPE_)::ajouter_(DoubleTab& resu) const        \
00094   {                                                                        \
00095     DoubleVect& bilan = so_base->bilan();                                \
00096     for (int num_elem=0; num_elem<nb_elem_; num_elem++)                        \
00097       {                                                                        \
00098         double source = evaluateur_source_elem.calculer_terme_source(num_elem);        \
00099         resu[num_elem] += source;                                        \
00100         bilan(0) += source;                                \
00101       }                                                                        \
00102     return resu;                                                        \
00103   }                                                                        \
00104   DoubleTab& It_Sou_CoviMAC_Elem(_TYPE_)::ajouter_(DoubleTab& resu,int ncomp) const        \
00105   {                                                                        \
00106     DoubleVect source(ncomp);                                                \
00107     DoubleVect& bilan = so_base->bilan();                                \
00108     for (int num_elem=0; num_elem<nb_elem_; num_elem++) {                \
00109       evaluateur_source_elem.calculer_terme_source(num_elem, source);        \
00110       for (int k=0; k<ncomp; k++)                                        \
00111         {                                                                \
00112           resu(num_elem,k) += source(k);                                \
00113           bilan(k) += source(k);                        \
00114         }                                                                \
00115     }                                                                        \
00116     return resu;                                                        \
00117   }                                                                        \
00118   DoubleTab& It_Sou_CoviMAC_Elem(_TYPE_)::calculer(DoubleTab& resu) const        \
00119   {                                                                        \
00120     return resu;                                                        \
00121   }
